content.text:
# National Board of Review Awards 1994

66th National Board of Review Awards
----
Best Picture (tie):
Forrest Gump &Pulp Fiction
The 66th National Board of Review Awards, honoring the best in filmmaking in 1994, were announced on 14 December 1994 and given on 27 February 1995.
Top 10 films
#Forrest Gump / Pulp Fiction
#Quiz Show
#Four Weddings and a Funeral
#Bullets over Broadway
#Ed Wood
#The Shawshank Redemption
#''Nobody's Fool
#The Madness of King George
#Tom & Viv
#Heavenly Creatures
Top Foreign Films
#Eat Drink Man Woman
#To Live
#Strawberry and Chocolate
#Three Colors: Red
#Queen Margot
Winners
*Best Picture (tie):
**Forrest Gump
**Pulp Fiction
*Best Foreign Film:
**Eat Drink Man Woman
*Best Actor:
**Tom Hanks - Forrest Gump
*Best Actress:
**Miranda Richardson - Tom & Viv
*Best Supporting Actor:
**Gary Sinise - Forrest Gump
*Best Supporting Actress:
**Rosemary Harris - Tom & Viv
*Best Acting by an Ensemble:
**Pret a Porter
*Best Director:
**Quentin Tarantino - Pulp Fiction
*Best Screenplay:
**William Goldman - Career Achievement
*Best Documentary:
**Hoop Dreams
*Best Film made for Cable TV
**Tales of the City''
*Career Achievement Award:
**Sidney Poitier
*Billy Wilder Award for Excellence in Directing:
**Billy Wilder
*William K. Everson Award for Film History
**William K. Everson
*Special Citation:
**James Card, for outstanding film preservation
References
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20101125214358/http://nbrmp.org/awards/past.cfm?year=1994 National Board of Review of Motion Pictures :: Awards for 1994]
